ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.9'

about.description:
The modeller emg3d is a multigrid solver for 3D EM diffusion with tri-axial
electrical anisotropy. The matrix-free solver can be used as main solver or
as preconditioner for Krylov subspace methods, and the governing equations
are discretized on a staggered Yee grid.
about.summary: A multigrid solver for 3D electromagnetic diffusion.

about.description:
The modeller emg3d is a multigrid solver for 3D EM diffusion with tri-axial
electrical anisotropy. The matrix-free solver can be used as main solver or
as preconditioner for Krylov subspace methods, and the governing equations
are discretized on a staggered Yee grid.
about.summary: A multigrid solver for 3D electromagnetic diffusion.

name: emg3d
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set python_min = "3.10" %}
{% set name = "emg3d" %}
{% set version = "1.8.7" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 9ab0adc4a372f699aada1cbb3f5dc73964077114cd432220009f9eb41623a120
build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv
  entry_points:
    - emg3d=emg3d.cli.main:main

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - setuptools
    - setuptools_scm
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - numpy
    - scipy >=1.10
    - numba
    - empymod >=2.3.2

test:
  requires:
    - python {{ python_min }}
  imports:
    - emg3d
    - emg3d.inversion
    - emg3d.inversion.simpeg
    - emg3d.inversion.pygimli

about:
  home: https://emsig.xyz
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_family: APACHE
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: A multigrid solver for 3D electromagnetic diffusion.
  description: |
    The modeller emg3d is a multigrid solver for 3D EM diffusion with tri-axial
    electrical anisotropy. The matrix-free solver can be used as main solver or
    as preconditioner for Krylov subspace methods, and the governing equations
    are discretized on a staggered Yee grid.
  doc_url: https://emg3d.emsig.xyz
  dev_url: https://github.com/emsig/emg3d

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - prisae
